content: कल्किः The tenth and last incarnation of Viṣṇu in his capacity of the destroyer of the wicked and liberator of the world from its enemies; (Jayadeva, while referring to the several {%avatāras%} of Viṣṇu, thus refers to the last or {%Kalki%} avatāra: --म्लेच्छनिवहनिधने कलयसि करवालम् धूमकेतुमिव किमपि करालम् . केशव धृतकल्किशरीरं जय जगदीश हरे .. <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> <ls n="Gīt.">10.</ls>)
